alert.note: Alert for Western Grant; Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 4:53PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT GARRETT...NORTHWESTERN GRANT AND WEST CENTRAL MINERAL COUNTIES... At 450 PM EDT, heavy snow showers were located along a line extending from near Farmington to 8 miles northeast of Belington. Movement was east at 25 mph. Locations impacted include... Mountain Lake Park, Oakland, Bayard, Bittinger, Grantsville, Loch Lynn Heights, Friendsville, Deer Park, Accident, Elk Garden, Kitzmiller, Franklin, Luke, Redhouse, Hutton, Gorman, Jennings, Deep Creek Lake State Park, Crellin and Swallow Falls State Park. This includes Interstate 68 in Maryland between mile markers 1 and 30. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a one-half of a mile in these snow showers. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through these dangerous snow showers. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the snow showers pass your location. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
